<p>Anker makes some of our favorite charging gear, and now you can save on a bunch of wireless power accessories from the brand. Whether you're going back to school soon or want a new charging station that can power up a few devices at once, there are discounts here worth considering. One of the best is this <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DDQ71B9P&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9c967642-c71f-4b44-b6f0-23d36c2f3d23&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=3-in-1+MagSafe+charging+station&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAcvgLCPieVsXiT5cALRoC4R4tp4Ql355HC76T7XrPGOz&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-MagGo-Wireless-Charging-Station%2Fdp%2FB0DDQ71B9P" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-MagGo-Wireless-Charging-Station/dp/B0DDQ71B9P?th=1">3-in-1 MagSafe charging station</a>, on sale for a record low price of $63. The Qi2-certified charger wirelessly charges your compatible iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods on one compact and convenient dock. Qi2 boasts 15W of power, so you can take advantage of fast charging on compatible devices.</p> 
<p>This means the station can charge an iPhone 16 Pro Max to 20 percent in just 20 minutes and an Apple Watch Series 10 from zero to 100 percent in just over an hour. The magnetic stand for your iPhone is adjustable with 45 degrees of vertical rotation and 360 degrees of horizontal rotation, so you can always find the perfect angle for your phone while charging.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span> 
<p> <core-commerce id="928ee9b1b3b645db97941d62dc1cb9be" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-MagGo-Wireless-Charging-Station/dp/B0DDQ71B9P?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>Being able to wirelessly charge these three daily devices at once might remind you of Apple's <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/2019-03-29-apple-cancels-airpower-charing-mat.html">wireless charging pad</a> that never was, but Anker's 3-in-1 charging station offers an elegant solution. We tend to like <a data-i13n="cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-power-bank-143048526.html">Anker's charging products</a>, and weâ€™ve found they make some of the <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-multi-device-wireless-charging-pads-120557582.html">best charging stations</a> on the market.</p> 
<p>Anker's products can be a bit pricey, though, which is why the best time to pick them up is during these sales. The company actually has a slew of its charging <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9c967642-c71f-4b44-b6f0-23d36c2f3d23&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=products+on+sale+right+now&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL3N0b3Jlcy9wYWdlL0QyNEZEQTE3LURFQ0YtNDZCQi1BRjQ3LUFGNDY0N0QyQjFGOC9zZWFyY2g_&amp;signature=AQAAAS5Uef4XqLl0ffOhSv5G2eCZL8mXrE5GSiYRLVwd4M64&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fstores%2Fpage%2FD24FDA17-DECF-46BB-AF47-AF4647D2B1F8%2Fsearch" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/D24FDA17-DECF-46BB-AF47-AF4647D2B1F8/search?ingress=2&amp;lp_context_asin=B0DDQ71B9P&amp;visitId=194a7ebb-318e-4a70-ad37-a1b875388074&amp;store_ref=bl_ast_dp_brandLogo_sto&amp;ref_=ast_bln&amp;terms=wireless">products on sale right now</a>. Its <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B09TT8GZK9&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9c967642-c71f-4b44-b6f0-23d36c2f3d23&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=3-in-1+wireless+charging+cube&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0Fua2VyLU1hZ25ldGljLUNoYXJnZXItUG9ydGFibGUtU3RhdGlvbi9kcC9CMDlUVDhHWks5L3JlZj1hc3Rfc3RvX2RwX3B1aXM_&amp;signature=AQAAAbq8aFnxC-8r3kCv8TR6LDRynYupoUtp7pbRAmSsL-bP&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Magnetic-Charger-Portable-Station%2Fdp%2FB09TT8GZK9%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Magnetic-Charger-Portable-Station/dp/B09TT8GZK9/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis">3-in-1 wireless charging cube</a> is 31 percent off right now and down to $104. If you're a Prime member and have a Qi2-compatible iPhone, then you might also look at <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DRCSZ618&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=9c967642-c71f-4b44-b6f0-23d36c2f3d23&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker%27s+simple+Qi2+charging+pad&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAb02i9CeDhGf_TMldDfNzEqAAGlMV4Ar5MbHYTAqRGHY&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Magnetic-Wireless-Certified-MagSafe-Compatible%2Fdp%2FB0DRCSZ618%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Magnetic-Wireless-Certified-MagSafe-Compatible/dp/B0DRCSZ618/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1">Anker's simple Qi2 charging pad</a>, which is 35 percent off for a two-pack right now.</p>
